attributes.action: Not allow the police and security guards around him to bear arms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's an embarrassment that the very politicians such as yourself, who've disarmed and taken away the right to self- defence from the British people, hide behind such a barrier of weaponary and guards.
Are you more valuable than an average British citizen?
I therefore ask that you bring about true equality by making it law that no one guarding you may do so with weaponary, remember, self- defence Is Not a viable excuse for carrying weapons.
Alternatively you could allow the British public their right to defence back and have an informed debate in Parliament over the right to bear arms, but what are the chances of that?
